titleStmt.title: Holsome and catholyke doctryne concerninge the seuen Sacramentes of Chrystes Church expedient to be knowen of all men, set forth in maner of shorte sermons to bee made to the people, / by the reuerend father in God. Thomas byshop of Lincolne. Anno. 1558. Mense Februarij.
titleStmt.author: Watson, Thomas, 1513-1584.

titleStmt.title: Holsome and catholyke doctryne concerninge the seuen Sacramentes of Chrystes Church expedient to be knowen of all men, set forth in maner of shorte sermons to bee made to the people, / by the reuerend father in God. Thomas byshop of Lincolne. Anno. 1558. Mense Februarij.
titleStmt.author: Watson, Thomas, 1513-1584.

notesStmt.note: At foot of title: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Colophon reads: Imprynted at London, by Robert Caly, within the precinct of Christes Hospitall. The. x. of February. M.D.LVIII. ..
This edition has A1r catchword "working"; last line has "onelye".
Identified as STC 25112 on UMI microfilm reel 371, and as STC 25113 on reel 1562.

Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reel 371), the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library (reel 1562), and Harvard University. Library (reel 1884).
Reel 1562: colophon misbound after title page.
